content.text:
# Draft:Ankush Tiwari

----
Ankush Tiwari
Ankush Tiwari (born 1994) is an Indian technologist, Oracle ERP specialist, author, poet, and three-time TEDx speaker. He is the founder and CEO of Global Savian Consulting Pvt Ltd, headquartered in Noida, India.
Early life and education
Tiwari was born in Delhi to a security guard father and tailor mother. He completed his B.Tech in Electronics and Communication in 2015.
Career
Technology and entrepreneurship
He began his professional journey as a senior software engineer with Oracle ERP systems. In 2021, he founded Global Savian Consulting, specializing in Oracle Fusion Cloud and staffing.
Speaking and writing
Tiwari delivered a TEDx talk titled Winning must not be the final destination at TEDxLLIM in July 2018. He also founded a poetry community, "Chand Ka Tukda," and has authored two books.
Poetry and public content
His poetry performances are featured on platforms such as The Social House and YourQuote.
Personal life
Tiwari is known for his Hindi poetry performances and digital content. His rise from modest roots to entrepreneurship has been recognized in various media profiles.
References
